explains: adv. 临床地；门诊部地；不偏不倚；通过临床诊断

sentences.en: There are more clinically trained social workers than clinically trained psychiatrists, psychologists, and psychiatric nurses combined.
sentences.cn: 受过临床训练的社会工作者比受过临床训练的精神病医生、心理学家和精神科护士加起来还要多。

sentences.en: She was diagnosed as being clinically depressed.
sentences.cn: 她被诊断为患临床抑郁症。

sentences.en: Leaving aside the tiny minority who are clinically depressed, most people who have bad moods also have very good moods.
sentences.cn: 先不谈极少数患有临床抑郁症的人，大多数有坏情绪的人也有很好的情绪。
